description: Try our easy to follow Brie Charcuterie Layer Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Brie Charcuterie Layer Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place remaining brie wheel on top. Top with slices of prosciutto rolled to resemble roses and garnish with grissini sticks. Drizzle assembled brie cake with honey and serve with extra fruit, grissini sticks and drizzled honey.
